traits.name: Tunneler
entries: The dragon can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6 damage) cold damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Cold Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales a blast of frost in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the cone must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 27 (6d8 damage) cold damage, and its speed is halved until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage, and its speed isn't reduced.
